title: Local tech startup Sustainable partners with Bridgeway Capital and Kiva Pittsburgh to showcase its business assessment tech - Pittsburgh Business Times
content: Local tech startup Sustainable partners with Bridgeway Capital and Kiva Pittsburgh to showcase its business assessment tech  Pittsburgh Business Times
description: Sustainable, a local tech-focused startup that offers a business model assessment tool to entrepreneurs and their startups, announced it entered into a partnership that will supply eligible businesses with Sustainable's tech-driven evaluation tools.
